response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to us both. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and it has been designed to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. I am extending to you a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,150,000. This is a generous offer, considering the significant benefits and returns the product promises. I believe this price reflects its true value while offering you a competitive advantage in your endeavors. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 1150000}
